dashboard.description: Uploaded by andrewn at Mon 29 Jun 2020 08:04:09 UTC

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

targets.expr:
min by (type) (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="api"} offset 1w)
or
min by (type) (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="api"} offset 1w)

panels.title: api Service Apdex Score

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

targets.expr:
min by (type) (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="web"} offset 1w)
or
min by (type) (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="web"} offset 1w)

panels.title: git Service Apdex Score

panels.title: registry Service Apdex Score

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions within a minute period. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

targets.expr:
clamp_max(
  max by (type) (max_over_time(gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="api"}[$__interval]))
  or
  sum by (type) (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="api"}),
  1
)

max by (type) (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="api"} offset 1w)
or
sum by (type) (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{environment="$environment",monitor!~"global|",stage="$stage",type="api"} offset 1w)
